open.title: Vumatel Villages degraded service | Gauteng
open.description: We are investigating reports of degraded service affecting clients on the Vumatel villages network in Gauteng. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: We are still working with our upstream provider on resolving the issue. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.
Afrihost and Vumatel engineers are still working on resolving the issue. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.
Afrihost and Vumatel engineers are investigating the issue to find a resolution as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
